0.text: Innate - The Secret Weapon: Zac gains increased percentage size equal to 1.5% of his bonus health, capped at 35% increased size at 2333.33 bonus health. Zac's size also reduces based on his missing health, down to 70% total size while at 0% health.
0.html: Innate - The Secret Weapon: Zac gains increased percentage size equal to 1.5% of his bonus health, capped at 35% increased size at 2333.33 bonus health. Zac's size also reduces based on his missing health, down to 70% total size while at 0% health.

1.text:
Innate - Goo: Whenever Zac damages at least one enemy with an ability, he sheds a number of chunks of himself to a nearby location, landing towards  visible nearby enemy champions and lasting for 6 seconds.
 Stretching Strikes: 1 chunk for each strike hit (excluding the collision) on different targets, up to 2
 Unstable Matter: 1 chunk if it hits at least one target
 Elastic Slingshot: 1 chunk for each enemy champion hit
 Let's Bounce!: 1 chunk for each bounce that hits an enemy champion, up to 4
1.html:
Innate - Goo: Whenever Zac damages at least one enemy with an ability, he sheds a number of chunks of himself to a nearby location, landing towards visible nearby enemy champions and lasting for 6 seconds.

  • Stretching Strikes: 1 chunk for each strike hit (excluding the collision) on different targets, up to 2
  • Unstable Matter: 1 chunk if it hits at least one target
  • Elastic Slingshot: 1 chunk for each enemy champion hit
  • Let's Bounce!: 1 chunk for each bounce that hits an enemy champion, up to 4

2.text: Both Zac and enemy champions can interact with a chunk by being within 50 units of it: an enemy will destroy it, while Zac will consume it to  heal for 4 / 4.75 / 5.5 / 6.25% (based on  Let's Bounce!'s Rank) of his maximum health.
2.html: Both Zac and enemy champions can interact with a chunk by being within 50 units of it: an enemy will destroy it, while Zac will consume it to heal for 4 / 4.75 / 5.5 / 6.25% (based on Let's Bounce!'s Rank) of his maximum health.

3.text: Innate: Periodically, upon taking  fatal damage, Zac enters  resurrection for 8 / 7 / 6 / 5 / 4 (based on level) seconds and restores 50% of his maximum health, splitting into 4 uncontrollable  Bloblets. Each bloblet has 12% of his maximum health and moves towards Zac's location over the duration. Any damage the bloblets receive, excluding damage dealt in excess of their total health, is also redirected to Zac in  true damage. While in resurrection, Zac is  untargetable and  unable to act, and cannot take damage from sources other than the redirected damage from his bloblets.
3.html: Innate: Periodically, upon taking fatal damage, Zac enters resurrection for 8 / 7 / 6 / 5 / 4 (based on level) seconds and restores 50% of his maximum health, splitting into 4 uncontrollable Bloblets. Each bloblet has 12% of his maximum health and moves towards Zac's location over the duration. Any damage the bloblets receive, excluding damage dealt in excess of their total health, is also redirected to Zac in true damage. While in resurrection, Zac is untargetable and unable to act, and cannot take damage from sources other than the redirected damage from his bloblets.

4.text: After the duration, Zac is revived with 10 - 50% maximum health. Zac will die once all bloblets are killed.
4.html: After the duration, Zac is revived with 10 - 50% maximum health. Zac will die once all bloblets are killed.

5.text: See Pets for more details about bloblets.
5.html: See Pets for more details about bloblets.

0.text: Active: Zac stretches his left arm in the target direction that catches the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage,  slowing them by 40% for 0.5 seconds, and forming a  revealing  tether between Zac and the target for 2 seconds.
0.html: Active: Zac stretches his left arm in the target direction that catches the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage, slowing them by 40% for 0.5 seconds, and forming a revealing tether between Zac and the target for 2 seconds.

1.text: While the tether persists, Zac's next basic attack is replaced by a second Stretching Strike, empowering it to have a 0.25-second cast time and gain  25 bonus attack range. This attack cannot  critically strike.
1.html: While the tether persists, Zac's next basic attack is replaced by a second Stretching Strike, empowering it to have a 0.25-second cast time and gain  25 bonus attack range. This attack cannot critically strike.

2.text: If the two Stretching Strikes affect different targets, both are  rooted for 0.5 seconds and receive the same  slow. After a 0.4-second delay, Zac displaces them toward each other over 300-units, though not through terrain.
2.html: If the two Stretching Strikes affect different targets, both are rooted for 0.5 seconds and receive the same slow. After a 0.4-second delay, Zac displaces them toward each other over 300-units, though not through terrain.

3.text: If the two targets are near each other, they're instead slammed together via the displacement. This deals the initial magic damage,  knocks up and  stuns them for 0.25 seconds upon impact. Surrounding enemies are also dealt the initial magic damage.
3.html: If the two targets are near each other, they're instead slammed together via the displacement. This deals the initial magic damage, knocks up and stuns them for 0.25 seconds upon impact. Surrounding enemies are also dealt the initial magic damage.

4.text: Both Stretching Strikes (the cast and the empowered attack)  reset Zac's basic attack timer. Zac is unable to move or attack while his left arm is in flight.
4.html: Both Stretching Strikes (the cast and the empowered attack) reset Zac's basic attack timer. Zac is unable to move or attack while his left arm is in flight.

0.text: Active: Zac explodes to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, capped against  minions and  monsters.
0.html: Active: Zac explodes to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, capped against minions and monsters.

0.content: 35 / 50 / 65 / 80 / 95 (+ 4 / 5 / 6 / 7 / 8% (+ 4% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)

1.text: Zac grants  ghosting to monsters hit for 5 seconds.
1.html: Zac grants ghosting to monsters hit for 5 seconds.

2.text: Unstable Matter's cooldown is  reduced by 1 second whenever Zac collects a  Cell Division chunk.
2.html: Unstable Matter's cooldown is  reduced by 1 second whenever Zac collects a Cell Division chunk.

0.text: Active: Zac  charges for up to 4.5 seconds to increase Elastic Slingshot's  range over a cone in the target direction.
0.html: Active: Zac charges for up to 4.5 seconds to increase Elastic Slingshot's  range over a cone in the target direction.

1.text: Elastic Slingshot can be recast within the duration. If Zac cancels* the channel himself, or the charge completes without reactivation, 50% of Elastic Slingshot's  health cost and  cooldown are refunded.
1.html: Elastic Slingshot can be recast within the duration. If Zac cancels* the channel himself, or the charge completes without reactivation, 50% of Elastic Slingshot's  health cost and  cooldown are refunded.

2.text: Recast: Zac  dashes to the target location to deal magic damage to enemies hit on impact,  knocking them up and  stunning them for 0.5 seconds, increased to 1 second if Elastic Slingshot was charged for more than 1 second.
2.html: Recast: Zac dashes to the target location to deal magic damage to enemies hit on impact, knocking them up and stunning them for 0.5 seconds, increased to 1 second if Elastic Slingshot was charged for more than 1 second.

3.text: Elastic Slingshot will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
3.html: Elastic Slingshot will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Passive: Healing from  Cell Division chunks is increased.
0.html: Passive: Healing from Cell Division chunks is increased.

1.text: Active: Zac bounces after the cast time, then bounces 3 additional times each second over 3 seconds, during which he also gains 20% − 50% (based on duration)  bonus movement speed but becomes unable to declare basic attacks and use  Stretching Strikes and  Elastic Slingshot.
1.html: Active: Zac bounces after the cast time, then bounces 3 additional times each second over 3 seconds, during which he also gains 20% − 50% (based on duration)  bonus movement speed but becomes unable to declare basic attacks and use Stretching Strikes and Elastic Slingshot.

2.text: Each bounce deals magic damage to enemies hit,  knocks them back over 1 second, and  slows them by 20% for the same duration.
2.html: Each bounce deals magic damage to enemies hit, knocks them back over 1 second, and slows them by 20% for the same duration.

3.text: An enemy can be hit by multiple bounces, but ones beyond the first deal 50% damage to them and do not apply the  knock back.
3.html: An enemy can be hit by multiple bounces, but ones beyond the first deal 50% damage to them and do not apply the knock back.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+7% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Chilling Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Chilling Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all of this item's effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

+450 health
+35 armor
+35 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 − 30 (based on level) (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within 325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.
Unique – Flametouch: At maximum stacks, your basic attacks create an explosion around you, applying a burn to all nearby enemies that deals your current Immolate damage to them over 3 seconds.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5% tenacity, 50 bonus health and 5% slow resist.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IMMOLATE: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 − 30 (based on level) (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within  325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.

passive.originText: UNIQUE – FORTIFY: Increase your bonus armor and bonus magic resistance by 5% for 6 seconds when a champion deals damage to you, stacks up to 5 times for a maximum of 25%. This stacks once per unique champion.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  1050

origin: 35 / 50 / 65 / 80 / 95 (+ 4 / 5 / 6 / 7 / 8% (+ 4% per 100 ap) of target's maximum health)
st_flatStats0.concerningText: Active: Zac explodes to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, capped against  minions and  monsters.

origin: 35 / 50 / 65 / 80 / 95 (+ 4 / 5 / 6 / 7 / 8% (+ 4% per 100 ap) of target's maximum health)
0.concerningText: Active: Zac explodes to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, capped against  minions and  monsters.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Active: Zac stretches his left arm in the target direction that catches the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage,  slowing them by 40% for 0.5 seconds, and forming a  revealing  tether between Zac and the target for 2 seconds.
